Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces joined) of the body of a red pottery vessel, fabric is grey in section, interior ribbed and partially covered with an off-white deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents (wine ?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393173) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393173)
